title: How does one burn a DVD on a laptop? - Quora

response.answer_text: It depends on the laptop. It'll need a dvd drive that can burn DVDs And a lot software that can make DVDs from your videos, photos and audio. Apple have long since phased out iDVD: and stopped making Macs with DVD drives. So, the few times I need to make a DVD, I use Burn, to author and burn DVDS to an external drive
